TranslationSet.base:
1) Open System Preferences
2) Open Accessibility preferences 
3) Select “Accessibility Apps”
4) Add this application to the approval list
TranslationSet.tran:
1) Öffne die Systemeinstellungen
2) Öffne die Bedienungshilfen 
3) Wähle „App-Zugriff“
4) Füge diese App zur Liste der erlaubten Apps hinzu

TranslationSet.base:
1) Open System Preferences
2) Open Accessibility preferences 
3) Select “Accessibility Apps”
4) Add this application to the approval list
TranslationSet.tran:
1) Abra as Preferências do Sistema
2) Abra as preferências de Acessibilidade 
3) Selecione “Apps de Acessibilidade”
4) Adicione este aplicativo à lista de aprovados

TranslationSet.base:
1) Open System Preferences
2) Open Accessibility preferences 
3) Select “Accessibility Apps”
4) Add this application to the approval list
TranslationSet.tran:
1) Abre Preferencias del Sistema.
2) Abre el panel de preferencias Accesibilidad.
3) Selecciona “Apps de accesibilidad”.
4) Añade esta aplicación a la lista de aplicaciones aprobadas.

TranslationSet.base:
1) Open System Preferences
2) Open Accessibility preferences 
3) Select “Accessibility Apps”
4) Add this application to the approval list
TranslationSet.tran:
1) Open Systeemvoorkeuren
2) Open het voorkeurenpaneel 'Toegankelijkheid' 
3) Selecteer 'Apps'
4) Voeg deze app toe aan de lijst

TranslationSet.base:
1) Open System Preferences
2) Open Accessibility preferences 
3) Select “Accessibility Apps”
4) Add this application to the approval list
TranslationSet.tran:
1) Ouvrez Préférences Système
2) Ouvrez les préférences Accessibilité
3) Choisissez « Applications d’accessibilité »
4) Ajoutez l’application à la liste approuvée

TranslationSet.base:
1) Open System Preferences
2) Open Accessibility preferences 
3) Select “Accessibility Apps”
4) Add this application to the approval list
TranslationSet.tran:
1) Apri Preferenze di Sistema
2) Apri le preferenze Accessibilità 
3) Seleziona “App accessibilità”
4) Aggiungi l’applicazione all’elenco delle approvazioni

TranslationSet.base:
1) Open System Preferences
2) Open Accessibility preferences 
3) Select “Accessibility Apps”
4) Add this application to the approval list
TranslationSet.tran:
1）“システム環境設定”を開きます
2）“アクセシビリティ”環境設定を開きます
3）“アクセシビリティアプリケーション”を選択します
4）このアプリケーションを許可リストに追加します

TranslationSet.base:
1) Open System Preferences
2) Open Accessibility preferences 
3) Select “Accessibility Apps”
4) Add this application to the approval list
TranslationSet.tran:
1) 시스템 환경설정 열기
2) 손쉬운 사용 환경설정 열기 
3) ‘손쉬운 사용 앱’ 선택
4) 이 응용 프로그램을 승인 목록에 추가

TranslationSet.base:
1) Open System Preferences
2) Open Accessibility preferences 
3) Select “Accessibility Apps”
4) Add this application to the approval list
TranslationSet.tran:
1) Откройте Системные настройки.
2) Перейдите в раздел «Универсальный доступ».
3) Выберите «ПО Универсального доступа».
4) Добавьте эту программу в утвержденный список.

TranslationSet.base:
1) Open System Preferences
2) Open Accessibility preferences 
3) Select “Accessibility Apps”
4) Add this application to the approval list
TranslationSet.tran:
1)打开“系统偏好设置”
2)打开“辅助功能”偏好设置
3)选择“辅助功能App”
4)将此应用程序添加到批准列表

TranslationSet.base:
1) Open System Preferences
2) Open Accessibility preferences 
3) Select “Accessibility Apps”
4) Add this application to the approval list
TranslationSet.tran:
1) Öppna Systeminställningar.
2) Öppna Hjälpmedel. 
3) Markera Hjälpmedelsprogram.
4) Lägg till det här programmet i listan över godkända program.

TranslationSet.base:
1) Open System Preferences
2) Open Accessibility preferences 
3) Select “Accessibility Apps”
4) Add this application to the approval list
TranslationSet.tran:
1) เปิดการตั้งค่าระบบ
2) เปิดการตั้งค่าการช่วยการเข้าถึง 
3) เลือก “แอพการช่วยการเข้าถึง”
4) เพิ่มแอพพลิเคชั่นนี้ไปที่รายการที่ให้อนุญาต

TranslationSet.base:
1) Open System Preferences
2) Open Accessibility preferences 
3) Select “Accessibility Apps”
4) Add this application to the approval list
TranslationSet.tran:
1) 打開「系統偏好設定」
2) 打開「輔助使用」偏好設定
3) 選擇「輔助使用App」
4) 將此應用程式加入允許列表
